txt.en: 'Well it seems your little plan worked!  Fiddlesticks!  \n\n'Another party ruined, no thanks to you. Why don't you go tell your good friend Hamfast what you've done here? No doubt he put you up to all this, what with his precious Marigold being sent up here to embarrass me so.'

'So that Lobelia was planning on keeping all the best food for herself and her own? I'm glad that you were able to set things to rights, and so are the rest of the folk here in Hobbiton.

'We only thought it proper to get you something. Lobelia was right, in a way: we don't have much in the way of spare proffer, but we share what we can, especially for those who have given us as much as you!

'We would like you to have this Yule-tree. It's a transplant -- my nephew Halfast brought it down from the Northfarthing. We were going to plant it in the yard, but seeing as how you helped us so...well, Marigold thought it would be best if you took it for your house.'
You were able to stop Lobelia's plan to keep all the best Yule-feast food for herself.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Gaffer Gamgee is outside his hole on Bagshot Row at the foot of the Hill.\n\nYou should tell Gaffer Gamgee about Lobelia's folied plans.
Gaffer Gamgee is outside his hole on Bagshot Row at the foot of the Hill.\n\nYou should tell Gaffer Gamgee about Lobelia's folied plans.
